products.title: Sevilla Blackout Royal Blue Roller Blind
products.description: The perfect shade of blue, this sevilla royal blue roller blind is not too dark and not too light its just right. Whether you want to create a nautical theme in your bathroom or something darker and more traditional elsewhere, this blind is the ideal blue choice.
